body_content.explanation: to harm someone again in an unfair way after they have been harmed in the past; to treat someone as a victim again (= a person who does not or cannot defend themselves against the harm that they are suffering):
examples: The court has to explain its continual pattern of revictimizing this girl.
We would never want to revictimize a victim.
It is essential to protect the rights of victims and ensure they are not re-victimized when their cases are reopened.
